solution_line_template: Joey will take a break after {total_pages} * {break_percent_decimal} = <<{total_pages}*{break_percent_decimal}={pages_before_break}>>{pages_before_break} pages
Joey will have to read {total_pages} - {pages_before_break} = <<{total_pages}-{pages_before_break}={pages_after_break}>>{pages_after_break} pages more.
